lead_paragraph: The Giants are 10th in overall defense, but 28th in scoring defense. There are questions aplenty for Bill Sheridan, the first-year defensive coordinator.
snippet: The Giants are 10th in overall defense, but 28th in scoring defense. There are questions aplenty for Bill Sheridan, the first-year defensive coordinator.

headline.main: As Defense Is Assessed, the Giants Mostly Shrug
headline.seo: As Defense Is Assessed, the Giants Mostly Shrug
headline.print_headline: As Defense Is Assessed, The Giants Mostly Shrug
